
                            
                            <p>采用原创手绘形式，以趣味性引导孩子学习规划日程、分配任务‌，培养良好的时间观念和做事习惯。 <br>  <br>  <a href="https://pan.baidu.com/s/1CR0LZfyiegh6a84HMmXq3Q?pwd=1111" target="_blank">https://pan.baidu.com/s/1CR0LZfyiegh6a84HMmXq3Q?pwd=1111</a> <br>  <br> 分男孩女孩版，类似这样的图 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/09/111908z8dsvdgem9vvmt8e.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/09/111908z8dsvdgem9vvmt8e.png"> <br> </p>
